title: #480: Food Forest Abundance with Jim Gale ****(Must Listen)*****
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we welcome the Food Forest Abundance's Jim Gale to the show to discuss his work in helping people get off of Big Agriculture by teaching them to grow their own food. This episode is a must listen and easily one of the most important episodes we have done. Thank you for your support.

See Sam Tripoli Live- Tickets available at Samtripoli.com:

https://sidesplitterscomedy.laughstub.com/event.cfm?showTimingID=545512
